name: BARRACKPUR BELA MEMORIAL CHARITABLE WELFARE SOCIETY
briefDescription: The  NGO , Barrackpur Bela Memorial Charitable Welfare Society is a non-profit organization and working for the improvement of general health condition. But its special focus is on building up an awareness about cancer and get the treatment to this disease for under-privileged and vulnerable sections of society. The NGO organizes cancer screening test and general health camps  among rural people. It also works for the development of underprivileged children by way of organizing drawing competition, reciting of poem, music and Quiz competition . The NGO also help to underprivileged students by way of providing computer literacy programme with the help of local computer institute.

address: RAJ BHAVAN, 21/A NORTH PANPARA C LANE
